author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bcb Bancorp Earnings Increase 59.0 Percent To $4.6 Million In The First Quarter Of 2018
text:
April 23, 2018 / 1:15 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Bcb Bancorp Earnings Increase 59.0 Percent To $4.6 Million In The First Quarter Of 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - BCB Bancorp Inc: 
* BCB BANCORP, INC. EARNINGS INCREASE 59.0 PERCENT TO $4.6 MILLION IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018; DECLARES CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.14 PER SHARE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29 
* NET INTEREST INCOME, BEFORE PROVISION FOR LOAN LOSSES, INCREASED 12.6 PERCENT TO $16.4 MILLION IN CURRENT QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
